will be provided everyday for students under
18 years old from 11:00 - 1:00.
All schools will have a drive thru pick up line.
Students must be present to receive lunch.

div.script:
$(document).ready(function () {
        var logConsole = function (str) {
            console.log(str);
        };
        if ($('#tabPortlet_564273 .divTabEdit').val() == "True") {
            var isModern = ('True');
            if(isModern.toLowerCase() == "true")
            {
                var tabObj = $('#tabPortlet_564273 ');
                var tabM = $('#ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl18_divTabs').attr('portlet') == 'tab';

                function activate() {
                    $(tabObj).scrollingTabs({                 
                        tabs: [{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl18_divTabs_0","title":"Laptop Dist. and Repair","content":"Laptop Distribution and Repair
\n
\n
If your student does not have\naccess to a laptop at home we will be distributing laptops at 120\nLakeside Drive, Union SC 29379 (DO Annex/PERC).  A parent or guardian\nmust be present to receive a laptop.  The distribution times are as\nfollows:
\nMonday - 8-11 AM
\nTuesday - 8-11 AM and 3-6 PM
\nWednesday - 8-11 AM
\nThursday - 8-11 AM
\nFriday, Saturday and Sunday - Closed
\n
\n\n
\n
\nAgain this distribution is only for those that DO NOT currently have\nany device in the home to utilize.  \n\n
","active":true,"disabled":false},{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl18_divTabs_1","title":"Free Charter WIFI","content":"Free Charter WIFI Internet
\n
\nFree Wifi is also available in our area.  Charter/Spectrum are also\nturning on all local WiFi Hotspots for use by everyone.  Instructions and information can be found by visiting:  https://www.spectrum.com/free-w…/south-carolina/union-county.
","active":false,"disabled":false},{"paneId":"ctl00_ContentPlaceHolder1_ctl18_divTabs_2","title":"Free Hot Spot Locations","content":"Free Hot Spot Locations
\n

                        propPaneId: 'paneId', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propTitle: 'title', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propActive: 'active', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propDisabled: 'disabled', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        propContent: 'content', // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        tabMode : tabM,
                        scrollToTabEdge: false, // optional - pass in default value for demo purposes
                        disableScrollArrowsOnFullyScrolled: false // optional- pass in default value for demo purposes
                    }).on('ready.scrtabs', function() {
                        $('#'+this.id+' .tab-pane').attr('tabindex',0);
